motivation.quote: You are stronger than you think.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go get it.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
motivation.author: Anonymous

life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
life.author: Mallory Hopkins

life.quote: Do what you can with what you have, where you are.
life.author: Theodore Roosevelt

life.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
life.author: Robert Byrne

life.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
life.author: Abraham Lincoln

life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
life.author: Helen Keller

success.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
success.author: Thomas Jefferson

success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
success.author: Chris Grosser

success.quote: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
success.author: George Bernard Shaw

success.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
success.author: Pablo Picasso

success.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
success.author: Robert Collier

success.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
success.author: Anonymous

happiness.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
happiness.author: John Lennon

happiness.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
happiness.author: Audrey Hepburn

happiness.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
happiness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

happiness.quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happiness.quote: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement.
happiness.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

happiness.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
happiness.author: Omar Khayyam

wisdom.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

wisdom.quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
wisdom.author: William Shakespeare

wisdom.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.
wisdom.author: Lao Tzu

wisdom.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
wisdom.author: Seneca

wisdom.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
wisdom.author: Elbert Hubbard

wisdom.quote: The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common.
wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

wisdom.quote: The wise man does at once what the fool does finally.
wisdom.author: Niccolo Machiavelli
